title: HOW I GOT $50000 IN GRANTS TO FUND MY BACKYARD FARM!

tasks.task: Securing funding for a commercial vegetable farm
subtasks: Converting backyard gardening hobby into a profitable operation
Forming an LLC to write off expenses and take advantage of tax deductions
Utilizing 0% interest credit cards for greenhouses with structured payment plans
Applying for federal grants through the USDA and NRCS, including high tunnel grants, irrigation grants, low tunnel grants, and water line installation grants
Negotiating exceptions for building high tunnels on a 8% slope when standard is 5%
Expanding claim for low tunnel grant beyond the allocated 300 square feet by using funds to cover entire garden
Utilizing grant reimbursements for infrastructure purchases, then reinvesting savings into expansion
Exploring multiple grants over time, such as cover cropping, pollinator habitat, and rainwater catchment
Building trust and demonstrating credibility when meeting with USDA/NRCS representatives
Asking detailed questions and exploring “out of the box” funding opportunities

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Securing funding for a commercial vegetable farm with personal and government resources.
